long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CyberLink Browser Guard is the essential security extension for a protected web browsing experience. Developed by CyberLink, this advanced extension provides users with immediate alerts when accessing an inappropriate or potentially dangerous domain. With its intelligent algorithm and up-to-date database of inappropriate websites, phishing attempts, and malware, CyberLink Browser Guard ensures secure and aware browsing. Highly customizable and highly reliable, this extension offers you peace of mind while exploring the Internet
